text: Marsel İlhan was the defending champion, but he lost in quarterfinals to Konstantin Kravchuk. Aslan Karatsev won the title, defeating Konstantin Kravchuk in the final, 6–4, 4–6, 6–3. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw Kazan Kremlin Cup - Singles Category:Kazan Kremlin Cup Category:2015 in Russian sport
title: 2015 Kazan Kremlin Cup – Singles
